thread.title: Paul-Japan

author: Paul-Japan
title: Paul-Japan
text:
In my very first order, I made a mistake of not updating the number of items after entering the number, ended up ordering one item instead of the three I wanted.
There was no option to cancel the order so I placed another order for the rest of the items. The Customer support contacted me immediately when they saw it, and quickly rectify the situation - what a big relief!
The shipping and delivery system was also very fast. I would easily recommend this company.
The order itself is for my Daddy, but I hope to order some for myself soon.
